summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence for Zobro Management, LLC, issued by the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, Osbert E. Potter. It certifies that the company was duly registered to conduct business in the territory on December 14, 2016.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who certifies the existence of Zobro Management, LLC.

keyFacts: Zobro Management, LLC was registered to conduct business in the Virgin Islands on December 14, 2016.
The certificate was issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
The document serves as an official record of the company's legal existence.
